name: Save Your PC
description:
A 2D Platformer where go adventure into a fictional world to rescue your PC hardware which has been taken hostage by malware.

*Added support for Web-GL

If you wish to see how this game was developed, Check The Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFER3ER8DVLWYJ2X2dGkGKPnCZLwIR15P
